roleset.name: move like a snake, be snake-shaped

example.name: the one example
example.text: A squiggly line snakes across a video screen, gyrating erratically as subjects with hand-held computers register their second-by-second reactions to a speaker's remarks.
example.arg: gyrating erratically as subjects with hand-held computers register their second-by-second reactions to a speaker's remarks
